alert.note: Alert for Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 14 at 9:30AM EDT until October 14 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Gray ME has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Maine... Swift River At Roxbury affecting Oxford County. .Recent heavy rainfall has pushed river levels to near bankfull. Additional rainfall today is expected to bring river levels to minor or near minor flooding. For the Swift River...including Roxbury...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Swift River at Roxbury. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM EDT Friday the stage was 6.2 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage this afternoon to 7.5 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issuedthis evening at 800 PM EDT.
